content.rendered:
Wine ‘N’ Rubs was originally Founded in Sharpsville, Pennsylvania in 2018 and with a mission to extend our services to a larger community we kicked off our services to Nairobi’s massage lovers in 2019 with the aim of refreshing, rejuvenating and rebalancing our customers. With a team of highly trained therapists and top-quality products, we strive to grow and maintain our standards as top massage boutiques that offers premiere wellness and holistic services to our clients. We spend a lot of time and effort in garnering new skills and enhancing our existing skills. Wine And Rubs offers a highly personalized, integrative and comprehensive approach to skin care and general women wellness, providing the modern women with indulgent experiences at their convenient locations as well as online at our e-commerce destination wineandrubs.co.ke. A Holistic massage, whether with our founder or one of our rigorously trained therapists, includes a thorough diagnosis of your skin as well as analysis of your lifestyle and the subsequent effects on your general skin and visage. Wine And Rubs Skin Care Experts go through extensive training to consult and advise clients on the products that are best suited to each individual’s needs according to their skin’s current state. The skin is an organ that is ever changing based on environmental, internal, hormonal, and dietary factors. Wine And Rubs guides clients through the constantly evolving, sometimes challenging, and at times overwhelming world of skincare and Wellness. According to Wine And Rubs Founder, “For the first half of your life, you get the skin you were born with. But for the second half of your life, you get the skin you deserve, and I created Wine And Rubs to show you how. We aspire to assist skin to function at its most optimal form, and thus the best version of itself.”

STAY CONNECTED

It is not challenging to stay connected with WinenRubs. For the latest in Skincare and wellness from Wine N Rubs renowned staff, be sure to visit our blog: wineandrubs.co.ke/blog/. Moreover, to deep-dive into the world of how-to and instructional videos, their YouTube channel should not be missed. Finally, be sure to like Wine And Rub on Facebook and follow along on Instagram for all the latest happenings daily. http://wineandrubs.co.ke/blog/
